Submodules¶

ledsa.ledsa module¶

class ledsa.ledsa.LEDSA(channels=[0], load_config_file=True, build_experiment_infos=True, fit_leds=True)¶

Bases: object

find_search_areas(img_filename)¶

Find all LEDs in a single image file and define the search areas, in which future LEDs will be searched. The resultes are saved in a csv file.

load_line_indices()¶

Load line indices from a priviously generated csv file

load_search_areas()¶

Load the search areas from a priviously generated csv file.

match_leds_to_led_arrays()¶

Find for each led line array the corresponding leds. Save the results in a csv file and a plot.

plot_search_areas(img_filename)¶

Generate a plot with the search areas and their labels.

process_image_data()¶

Process the image data to find the changes in light intensity.

setup_restart()¶

Generate file needed to continue the smoke analysis step after stopping it.

setup_step3()¶

Generate files needed for the smoke analysis step.
